Articles.Content:
Please delete http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ssi-shuttlecraft-type-a-proton/ apparently this entry is bugged now as logged-out users see a Buy Now button instead of Download, no stats, and any search for it yields a blank search result entry missing its image.

If there was a way to preserve or modify the download hit count when I make the new entry, let me know too.

Thank you!

Try clicking the "Buy Now" button. It still downloads the .craft file, I just tested it.

No major problem.

Carry on.

As for the download count, sorry, no idea.

- K
Can you delete it anyways for me?
